title: 7.3.6 Write cost scanner tests
body:
## Parent Issue
#31 - 7.3 Cost Analysis Scanner

## Objective
Write tests for cost scanning functionality.

## Test Coverage
- Cost Explorer parsing
- Unused resource detection
- Rightsizing recommendations
- Savings calculations
- API endpoints

## Files to Create
- `tests/scanners/cost/test_cost_scanner.py`
- `tests/scanners/cost/test_unused_analyzer.py`
- `tests/scanners/cost/test_rightsizing.py`

## Estimated Time: 2.5 hours
